name: Soap Opera
description:
1080 x 1920 px.

The local superhero feels closer to me. Sci-fi, wrapped with surreal and mystical elements inherent in suburban society. A storyline related to the daily life of the countrified problem. Often, in watching soap operas, I see deformed objects that interest me. Without realizing it, people watch soap operas wrapped in attractive visuals because of the limitations of the soap opera maker's technology.

This is the first 3D artwork that I minted. After being confused in weeks about what kind of artwork I should mint.
